languages.text: "Может, есть способ разобраться с нехваткой лекарств? Люди за них убивают друг друга".

traits.locale_text: "Может, есть способ разобраться с нехваткой лекарств? Люди за них убивают друг друга".

languages.text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
languages.original_text: "Может, есть способ разобраться с нехваткой лекарств? Люди за них убивают друг друга".

traits.locale_text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
"Very good. And what about medicine? People are killing each other for it."
"Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
"Very good. And what about medicine? People are killing each other for it."
"Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
"Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
"Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
"Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
"Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
"Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"

languages.text: "Medikamente sind derart knapp, dass die Leute dafür töten. Lässt sich das ändern?"
languages.original_text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"

traits.locale_text: "Medikamente sind derart knapp, dass die Leute dafür töten. Lässt sich das ändern?"
"Sehr gut. "Und wie sieht es mit Medikamenten aus? Die Leute bringen sich dafür gegenseitig um."

languages.text: « Les médicaments sont si rares que les gens s'entretuent pour en obtenir. Il existe peut-être un moyen d'y remédier ? »
languages.original_text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"

traits.locale_text: « Les médicaments sont si rares que les gens s'entretuent pour en obtenir. Il existe peut-être un moyen d'y remédier ? »
« Parfait. Et pour les médicaments ? Les gens s'entretuent pour en récupérer. »

languages.text: «Las medicinas escasean tanto que la gente se está matando por ellas. ¿A lo mejor existe alguna solución?».
languages.original_text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"

traits.locale_text: «Las medicinas escasean tanto que la gente se está matando por ellas. ¿A lo mejor existe alguna solución?».
«Muy bien. ¿Y qué hay de las medicinas? La gente se está matando por ellas».

languages.text: 「薬があまりにも不足しているせいで、それを求めて人々が殺し合っている。何か打開策があるのでは？」
languages.original_text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"

traits.locale_text: 「薬があまりにも不足しているせいで、それを求めて人々が殺し合っている。何か打開策があるのでは？」
「とてもいいね。薬についてはどうだ？それを求めて人民は殺し合いをしているのだ」

languages.text: “目前药物非常短缺，人们会为了药物自相残杀。或许你能想到办法解决这个问题？”
languages.original_text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"

traits.locale_text: “目前药物非常短缺，人们会为了药物自相残杀。或许你能想到办法解决这个问题？”
“很好，那药的问题该怎么解决呢？人们会为了药物自相残杀。”

languages.text: "İlaç o kadar az bulunuyor ki insanlar onun için birbirlerini öldürüyor. Belki bundan kurtulmanın bir yolu vardır."
languages.original_text: "Medicine is in such short supply that people are killing each other for it. Perhaps there is a way out?"
